EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/how-to-make-cars-smarter]]> Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar How to make cars smarter - a step towards self-driving cars, October 20, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: October 20, 2016 11:00 AM PDT / 2:00 PM EDT / 6:00 PM GMT
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1267163/CB33E99AB279180CE138ECEC88E67E4D]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers.
{{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
The Pivotal Team
